subject: Inclusion of Bonus for early completion into Standard Bidding Document for the Civil Work Contracts for NHDP Phase-II

February 16, 2005 POLICY MATTERS TECHNICAL (47/2005) (Decision taken on note of CGM(EW)-Il dated 14.01.2005) Sub: Inclusion of Bonus for early completion into Standard Bidding Document for the Civil Work Contracts for NHDP Phase-Il Further to our Policy Circular of even number dated August 27 2004 , it has been decided that the following clause will be included in the Standard Bidding Document for the civil work contract for NHDP Phase-Il: - "If the contractor achieves completion of the whole of the works to the specified period of completion from the date of commencement; the Employer shall pay to the contractor a sum of One percent  of the initial  contract  price as bonus for   every completed month (part of month to be excluded) which shall elapse between the date of completion of all items of works as  stipulated in the contract,  including variations ordered by the Engineer and the specified period of completion limited to Six per cent of initial contract  price. In case of   time extension for any reason, bonus for early completion considering the extended time shall NOT be payable. This issues with approval of the Chairman: kf' (G.P.
